title: 【1.9】怎么生成一个有带盔甲的盔甲架

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
hqqaazz 发表于 2016-7-22 19:25
我以bread为例子
ArmorItems:[{}{}{}{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{{display:{Name:"Br ...
不好意思，多了一个{}，加NBT就是多一个tag。
ArmorItems:[{}{}{}{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{display:{Name:"Bread"},SkullOwner:{Id:"a75e3f60-2242-4429-8ece-bcde7753b064",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvZjM0ODdkNDU3ZjkwNjJkNzg3YTNlNmNlMWM0NjY0YmY3NDAyZWM2N2RkMTExMjU2ZjE5YjM4Y2U0ZjY3MCJ9fX0="}]}}}}]

replies.author: hqqaazz

replies.txt_content:
hqqaazz 发表于 2016-7-22 18:02
使用ArmorItems:[{}{}{}{}]从下往上，即鞋子到头盔这样数。

比如说：
头部是头颅怎么办

1134443057 发表于 2016-7-22 18:42
头部是头颅怎么办
还有如果只要头也要全部输吗？还是只要ArmorItems:[3:........

replies.txt_content:

还有如果只要头也要全部输吗？还是只要ArmorItems:[3:........

replies.txt_content:
1134443057 发表于 2016-7-22 19:04
在http://heads.freshcoal.com/maincollection.php的头颅怎么办(不行就算了）
我以bread为例子
ArmorItems:[{}{}{}{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{{display:{Name:"Bread"},SkullOwner:{Id:"a75e3f60-2242-4429-8ece-bcde7753b064",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvZjM0ODdkNDU3ZjkwNjJkNzg3YTNlNmNlMWM0NjY0YmY3NDAyZWM2N2RkMTExMjU2ZjE5YjM4Y2U0ZjY3MCJ9fX0="}]}}}}}]
